title: My tabs is broken help me!?!?!?!
body: When ever i press tab in game to see the score board, it shows me all the champions but all bunched up at the top plz help me!!!

replies.body:
It sounds like your game assets may be corrupt in some way. You may be able to resolve this by running a repair of your game files. You can complete this by hitting the Options Icon (cog) in the top-right of the client and then pressing the *Initiate a Full Repair* button.

Let me know if this worked!
